name: Rossignol X-Tour Escape R-Skin Tour Step-in Cross-country Skis - Unisex
categories: X-Tour Escape R-Skin Tour Step-in Cross-count
description: Dabble on and off the track. Built and shaped like traditional cross-country skis, you can count on the X-Tour Escape for a strong and confident performance for groomed trails and off-track touring. They balance powerful drive with a graceful glide, for a ride that conveys the pure oxygenated joy of traditional, cross-country style.Active cap construction flexes from tip to tail and offers good torsional rigidity.Extended edge offers good control and glide.Wood air core for light reliable performance.Sure Kick Concept for responsive kick and energy return.K5000 skin sport base glides on variable snow conditions.Replaceable mohair insert for zero-prep grip in your kick.Includes Tour Step In NNN bindings that are easy to use, even while wearing gloves.
